patthana15.82:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:1.1_1: Araṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:2.1_1: Araṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
